official_title: To amend the Civil Rights Commission Act of 1983 with respect to the subpoena power of the Commission.
short_title: Civil Rights Commission Amendments Act of 1996
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Civil Rights Commission Amendments Act of 1996 - Amends the Civil Rights Commission Act of 1983 to declare that the U.S. Commission on Civil Rights is not authorized to issue any subpoena except for an investigation, within the Commission's authority, of a specific incident of the deprivation of the right to vote or, in any other case, if the subpoena is directed to a Federal, State, or local governmental officer or employee.
